project_abstract.cdata: The goal of the project is to improve the quality of rural health manpower, thereby contributing to better quality health services and an improved health status of the rural poor in the six provinces. The project has three province-specific components and one central component. The Health Workers Planning component will strengthen the planning capability at the national, provincial and local levels. This component will define the tasks to be done to solve health problems and will identify the demand, the requirements and the utilization for all health worker categories. The Health Workers Training component will retrain large numbers of minimally trained rural health workers, train additional workers for underserved areas, and strengthen the training capability at the provincial, prefectural and county levels. Technical assistance will be provided for developing and implementing community oriented curricula, new teaching and learning methods, teacher training in pedagogy, integration of theory and practice, and evaluation of changes and innovations. The Rural Health Services Management component will improve the working conditions of rural health workers, develop alternative means for mobilizing financial resources to support rural health care delivery, for organizing and managing rural health services, and for compensating and stimulating rural health workers to emphasize preventive care; and provide support systems for supervising these workers effectively. A small Central Component will augment the institutional capacity of the Ministry of Public Health (MOPH) for coordinating and supporting project implementation activities. It will strengthen MOPH's capability to carry out its national mandate in planning and policy formulation, provide technical assistance to the project provinces, and evaluate project activities in order to disseminate the experience gained to

P003502.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>农村卫生人力开发项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的目标是提高农村卫生人员素质，从而为提高六省卫生服务质量和改善农村贫困人口健康状况作出贡献。本项目设有三个省级子项目和一个中央子项目。卫生工作者规划子项目将增强中央、省级和地方各级的规划能力，确定为解决卫生问题所需开展的工作，明确各类卫生工作者的需求、要求及使用情况。卫生工作者培训子项目将对大量很少接受培训的农村卫生工作者进行再培训，为服务不足地区培训更多工作者，加强省、地市和县级培训能力。项目将提供技术援助，用于开发并实施社区培训课程、新教学方法以及教授法、理论和实践相结合及变化和创新情况评价为内容的教师培训。农村卫生服务管理子项目将改善农村卫生工作者的工作条件，为调动财力支持农村医疗服务提供、组织和管理农村卫生服务、鼓励农村卫生工作者重视预防保健找出替代手段，为有效监督卫生工作者表现建立支持制度。中央子项目规模较小，将提升卫生部协调和支持项目实施工作的能力。本子项目将增强卫生部的规划和政策制定能力，向项目省提供技术援助，评价项目活动，以便向国内其它地区传播项目经验。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
